website_summaries.verdict: A smart-looking ozone generator with a variety of functions that help to clean and deodorize your home.
pros: This unit has triple-action cleaning power
It can deodorize the air through ozone production, remove larger dust and allergens via a carbon filter, and drop dust to the floor through ionization
The model also comes with a remote to make operation easy
cons: The unit can build up dust rather quickly, requiring frequent cleanings

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 for my 1700 sg ft musty smelly basement, after 3 days and for about 8 weeks the air is so clean smelling. Bought another for the 2500 sq ft upstairs' I had problems with it where it may have been damaged in shipment. I communicated with the tech over a five day period, he tried to walk me through some trouble shoot it with me, not to mention it was Christmas week and I did not expect a response till the next week, but the tech was responding night and day to assist me, ended up returning for another unit which works great. Great Product, Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: ron nelms

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine. Noticed a minor leak from the water ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine. Noticed a minor leak from the water regulator in our crawl space below the house after we bought it that was causing a mold and mildew smell primarily in the bedroom adjacent to it. Ran the machine one time and the smell was gone. Also asked a question of the manufacturer about the safest timing for returning home after "away" ozone feature is used and it was answered within 12 hours! Will continue to give it a power shot now and again to be sure, but after a week of use, we are 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette R. Holtham

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but I have a couple of issues with it. First one is when the unit is first turned on and I go to use the ozone, it's pretty strong even on the lowest setting. After it runs for an hour or so, the smell gets down to a point where it's tolerable. The second issue is the how loud the fan is even on the lowest speed. My guess it's a cheap fan. I wish I would of paid more attention to the return date as I would of returned it. We had a different brand some years ago and it was much more controlled than this one is - and quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Z

customer_reviews.title: 🛑 Stop here, no need to look further.
customer_reviews.text: My father has something like this, and let me tell you, the price of this is really cheaper than the value it gives. My father paid $3800 for his and this unit does just as good or better. Amazing times we live in.
customer_reviews.author: Ean

customer_reviews.title: So far does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to clean the air since my Sharper Image device longed out years ago. The Green Air Purifier is the one. There are several modes, if you will, each with its own purpose. I have only had mine a short while so haven’t had a chance, or need to clean it. The manual shows how, and I won’t lie, ,it looks a bit involved. So with that only to discover - so far this does a great job of freshening up the air. I’ll see how it fares with a good cigar.... if need be, I’ll update the review!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: This purifier is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is well worth buying at ANY price. It does the job it says it will and even more. I started it right up and what a difference. I told my husband to go ahead and fry his onions, it is no problem now. He can also smoke his cigars. This purifier is awesome. I also just got done buying a second one as the house is big. It works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Mar Gry

customer_reviews.title: Pure clean air!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for a month.This is the best purchase I have ever made. It does everything and more the seller says. If you want clean pure air this is for you.Absolutely awesome.I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the smoke smell
customer_reviews.text: Our neighborhood is in a heavily forested area. A major fire was in the area and it was filled with smoke for days (no damage to any homes). However our clothing smelled because we were outside getting leaves away from the house and watching the helicopters fly over our house with water for the fire. Bought this to get rid of smoke smell. Also loaned it to a neighbor who had even worse smoke smell. After a couple of days the smoke smell was gone from the house. My wife has a 'super nose' and likes the fresh smell when this machine runs.
customer_reviews.author: It is a wonderful day!

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I bought it primarily to get ride ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought it primarily to get ride of cigar and cigarette odors after my card games. I used it the very next day after it arrived and I was not disappointed. There are various settings that you can use when people occupy the room and when people are out. I ran the purifier a few hours after the card game was over and the cigar odors were all gone. I would suggest the online picture be changed so that you can get a better view of the panel when you look at it on the website.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand of this type of air cleaner for many, many years and we were never sick. When it broke I just couldn't find another one compatible so I didn't replace it. My husband and I both got the flu every year until I found and purchased this one. Not even a cold since! I learned my lesson and will never go without one of these in my home again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Ouillette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: We have had an ozone air purifier for years and it finally quit in us so we were on the search for a new one. Came across the Green Air Classic and purchased it hoping that it was the same great quality as my last. Well, let me tell ya. The unit itself is very sturdy and well made and looks great. Works as I had hoped it would. Not only that, the customer service provided by the seller of this product is AMAZING!! Trust me, if you appreciate a quality product and amazing customer service that backs that product, this is definitely the route to go. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purifier!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this item a few days but I really like it. It is similar to the other one I had so I know how it works. It is easy to use and is necessary for me since I have asthma.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Works real well
customer_reviews.text: The unit I have works real. Well n does cleans air Good recommend to any one needing one to buy here
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Powerful unit, could be used for both commercial and industrial duty. Eliminates odors.
customer_reviews.text: Ozone output is very powerful. Be careful. Otherwise it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face the device in front of the intake vent of your air conditioning systems,then the air circulation goes thru the ducts.
customer_reviews.text: We found this to be very effective.We noticed the difference in the air quality in the house.
customer_reviews.author: T.L. Castiglia

customer_reviews.title: Def worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my mother's home to get rid of the smokey smell, but before we gave it to her we used it in our house, and we're amazed at how the air actually smells clean, very hard to describe the sensation/aroma, but it is very pleasant. And yes, over time, it got rid of the smokey smell, and now it is back in our house. Great customer service if you need them, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Green Air - Reminds me of home; Colorado Rockies !
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Green Air; I have 2. These units put out a nice amount of Negative Ions, as well as neutralizing offending odors. I learned of this item from my Dentist, who installed them in his office & restrooms. Expensive? yes. But if maintained well, will last years (years 6 and 4 for mine). Growing up in Colorado, I know the smell of Negative Ions and these units replicate that perfectly. I wish JB Innovations had a smaller unit for my work-desk or car. The maintenance is simple and the results are wonderful. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have owed more expensive air purifiers in the past but they didn't work as good as this one. If for some reason this one ever fails I will replace it with the same model.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. All put together so all I had to do was plug in. Works great. Very quiet and I can actually smell the fresh clean air.

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a reasonably price
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I could smell the difference in our house in less than thirty minutes. The price was about a third less than the units I gave purchased in the past. I have found a company that I will use from now on

It has eliminated the 2 cats odor and minimize the dander. In addition, it has completely cut the odor of cigarette smoke from "mantown."

It is easy to limit this function whilst finding it useful too.

It's convenient also that it uses a standard plug that you'd find on a computer or monitor, so you've probably got spares of that around I bet ;-) FYI, manufactured in China. Overall, would buy it again and recommend it to friends.

customer_reviews.text: The purifier I received did not perform to my satisfaction. Seller offered to refund my money even though I did not keep the original box. Seller believes something must have happened to the unit during shipping, even though it appeared to be working. Due to the seller's willingness to make this purchase a positive experience, I've edited my revue and given this item an "OK" rating.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Better than advertised. Highly recommend! Eliminates all the odor from reptile food breeding. Let a neighbor use it to sanitize their house for sale while they where out of town. They reported all pet smells had been removed from the house when the sanitize option was selected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the air but the smell still comes back.
customer_reviews.author: antoine dulin

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the US made machine but way cheaper. Fan in louder but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and for a good price too! I have had this over a year now... Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H

product_meta.title: Green Air Classic Air Purifier Ozone Generator
product_meta.description: Working in conjunction with its carbon filter system, our air purifier pulls in unclean air from the rear, first passing through the carbon filter which removes airborne particles. This filter also acts to deodorize any unpleasant odors. Air then passes through the inner PCO cell, further filtering airborne contaminants. The anion emitters, now moved forward of the fan to the front panel, release trillions of negative ions into your home, attaching themselves to dust particles, and dropping them straight to the floor. This advanced function is ideal for eliminating dust, animal dander, and other harmful particles that float in the air. Left behind is fresh oxygen rich air. The sterilizer function turns on the units blue UV lamp. When you need to eliminate strong or offensive odors in your home, the Purifier/AWAY mode creates activated oxygen (ozone) based upon the square footage of your home. Perfect for eliminating tobacco smoke odors, cooking odors, chemical/cleaning agent odors, paint odors, etc. The activated oxygen will also clear pollution embedded in walls, ceilings, floors, carpets, furniture, clothing, countertops....all surfaces in your home. Use Purifier/AWAY mode (ozone function) when home is unoccupied on units built in timer. Ozone reverts back to oxygen after approx. 30 to 45 minutes. Return home to fresh, clean, oxygen rich air....provided only by the 4 advanced technologies of the Green Air Classic!! 2 year warranty.
feature_bullets: UPGRADED CARBON FILTER, HIGHEST OZONE OUTPUT IN ITS CLASS FOR A SINGLE PLATE UNIT (360mg/hr)
OZONE GENERATOR (TURN ON AND OFF) FOR STRONG ODOR REMOVAL
